briefdescription.para: Add a record to a writable provider.

parameterdescription.para: The data to add to the stream.

briefdescription.para: Get a random page from a provider.

detaileddescription.para:
You may only use this if EaglePageProvider_isRandomAccess() returns EagleTrue.
epp
The provider.
pageNumber
The number of the page where the first page will be 0.
The page, or NULL.

briefdescription.para: Check is a providers pages can be access in any order with EaglePageProvider_getPage().
Create a new writable page provider with zero records.

parameterdescription.para: The data type for the provider (and its pages).
The amount of records per page.

briefdescription.para: Get the next page from a stream provider.
Return the amount of pages remaining at the moment for a read/write provider.

simplesect.para: The number of pages available for reading.

briefdescription.para: Reset the cursor of a provider.
